skillDetailsWithMonstersList.skillDescription: Aura: Increases the Critical Chance of Aquatic Monsters in the party by 5% and the Critical Damage by 15%
Aura: When an allied Aquatic Monster is hit, 35% chance to inflict a Bleed stack onto the attacker equal to the damage received.
Aura: Critical Hits of Aquatic Monsters apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt.
Aura: Debuffs are 10% more effective against enemies for every Aquatic Monster in the party.
Aura: Aquatic and Warrior Monsters in the party start with Might, Glory, or Regeneration. They can gain an additional stack of those Buffs.
